templates.name: Checkmark / Cross
templates.description: Simple checkmark (pass) or cross (fail) based on boolean condition.
templates.preview_svg: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 100 100'><circle cx='50' cy='50' r='40' fill='%2316A34A'/><path d='M30 50 L45 65 L70 35' stroke='white' stroke-width='8' fill='none' stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round'/></svg>
templates.dax_template:
{{measure_name}} =
VAR _value = {{value_measure}}
VAR _threshold = {{threshold}}
VAR _isPassing = _value >= _threshold
VAR _checkmark = "<circle cx='50' cy='50' r='40' fill='{{color_pass}}'/><path d='M30 50 L45 65 L70 35' stroke='white' stroke-width='8' fill='none' stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round'/>"
VAR _cross = "<circle cx='50' cy='50' r='40' fill='{{color_fail}}'/><path d='M35 35 L65 65 M65 35 L35 65' stroke='white' stroke-width='8' fill='none' stroke-linecap='round'/>"
VAR _svg = "<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 100 100'>" & IF(_isPassing, _checkmark, _cross) & "</svg>"
RETURN "data:image/svg+xml;utf8," & _svg

templates.name: Three-State Checkmark
templates.description: Check (good), warning triangle (warning), or cross (bad) based on thresholds.
templates.preview_svg: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 100 100'><polygon points='50,15 90,85 10,85' fill='%23F59E0B'/><text x='50' y='72' text-anchor='middle' font-size='40' font-weight='bold' fill='white'>!</text></svg>
templates.dax_template:
{{measure_name}} =
VAR _value = {{value_measure}}
VAR _lowThreshold = {{threshold_low}}
VAR _highThreshold = {{threshold_high}}
VAR _checkmark = "<circle cx='50' cy='50' r='40' fill='{{color_good}}'/><path d='M30 50 L45 65 L70 35' stroke='white' stroke-width='8' fill='none' stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round'/>"
VAR _warning = "<polygon points='50,15 90,85 10,85' fill='{{color_warning}}'/><text x='50' y='72' text-anchor='middle' font-size='40' font-weight='bold' fill='white'>!</text>"
VAR _cross = "<circle cx='50' cy='50' r='40' fill='{{color_bad}}'/><path d='M35 35 L65 65 M65 35 L35 65' stroke='white' stroke-width='8' fill='none' stroke-linecap='round'/>"
VAR _icon =
    SWITCH(
        TRUE(),
        _value >= _highThreshold, _checkmark,
        _value >= _lowThreshold, _warning,
        _cross
    )
VAR _svg = "<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 100 100'>" & _icon & "</svg>"
RETURN "data:image/svg+xml;utf8," & _svg

templates.name: Icon Badge
templates.description: Badge-style indicator with icon and optional text label.
templates.preview_svg: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 80 30'><rect x='0' y='0' width='80' height='30' rx='15' fill='%2316A34A'/><path d='M12 15 L17 20 L27 10' stroke='white' stroke-width='3' fill='none' stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round'/><text x='45' y='20' font-size='12' fill='white' font-weight='bold'>OK</text></svg>
templates.dax_template:
{{measure_name}} =
VAR _value = {{value_measure}}
VAR _threshold = {{threshold}}
VAR _isPassing = _value >= _threshold
VAR _passLabel = "{{label_pass}}"
VAR _failLabel = "{{label_fail}}"
VAR _passBadge = "<rect x='0' y='0' width='80' height='30' rx='15' fill='{{color_pass}}'/><path d='M12 15 L17 20 L27 10' stroke='white' stroke-width='3' fill='none' stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round'/><text x='45' y='20' font-size='12' fill='white' font-weight='bold'>" & _passLabel & "</text>"
VAR _failBadge = "<rect x='0' y='0' width='80' height='30' rx='15' fill='{{color_fail}}'/><path d='M12 10 L22 20 M22 10 L12 20' stroke='white' stroke-width='3' fill='none' stroke-linecap='round'/><text x='45' y='20' font-size='12' fill='white' font-weight='bold'>" & _failLabel & "</text>"
VAR _svg = "<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 80 30'>" & IF(_isPassing, _passBadge, _failBadge) & "</svg>"
RETURN "data:image/svg+xml;utf8," & _svg
